I understand its worth to you is $800,000, and I'm willing to part with it for $1,200,000. This represents a substantial savings for you and a fair deal for me. Consider this a one-time opportunity to acquire this product at a price you can't refuse. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:

(2) Reject Alice's offer
